attributes.action: Deliver your promise to reduce the maximum stake on Fixed Odds Betting terminals
attributes.background: Last May, the Government's decision to cut the max stake to £2 was long overdue. To discover that this has now been delayed betrays our trust that this Government will keep their promises. To prioritise the interests of the Gambling Industry over vulnerable adults and their families is deeply wrong.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government already plan to reduce the maximum stake for fixed-odds betting terminals in October 2019. We're therefore not sure exactly what further action you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231741
